```{r NJ, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Read in the crime data from 2017 - 2019
setwd("/Users/xiafm/Documents/GitHub/NJ-opioidenv/data_raw")
crime_17 <- read.csv("/Users/xiafm/Documents/GitHub/NJ-opioidenv/data_raw/crime_data_2017.csv")
crime_1819 <- read.csv("/Users/xiafm/Documents/GitHub/NJ-opioidenv/data_raw/crime_data_2018-2019.csv")

```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
sum_17 <- crime_17 %>%
  filter(Population == "") %>%
  group_by(CountyFIPS, County) %>%
  summarise(Co_tot = sum(Total), 
            Year = "2017")

sum_1819 <- crime_1819 %>%
  group_by(CountyFIPS, County, Year) %>%
  summarise(Co_tot = sum(Total))
sum_1819$Year <- as.character(sum_1819$Year)
            
# Create one dataset that has all three years' data
crime <- bind_rows(sum_17, sum_1819) %>%
  arrange(CountyFIPS)

```
